name: Forty Thieves Solitaire Collection
description:
20 popular Forty Thieves games in one.

Do you love Forty Thieves Solitaire (also known as "Napoleon at St Helena" or "Big Forty"), but want a bigger challenge?

Now you can play Forty Thieves Solitaire and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty.

The collection contains:
• Ali Baba
• Busy Aces
• Deuces
• Forty Thieves
• Interchange
• Miss Milligan
• Parliament
• Red and Black
• Single Rail
• Thieves of Egypt

Plus 10 more...


Features:
• Unlimited undo
• Auto complete
• Statistics
• Rules for each game
